PRICE THIS VENUE 1 / 8 Provided by: GG's Waterfront Bar & Grill Report GG's Waterfront 954-929-4237 CALL VENUE FAVORITE Venue highlights Indoor and outdoor spaces Rentals included Valet parking Venue details Style: Banquet Hall/Restaurant, Ocean/Waterfront View Guest capacity: Accommodates up to 80 guests Services: Ceremony / Reception Indoor / Outdoor VIEW OPTIONS Location: 606 North Ocean Drive Hollywood, FL 33019 Description: GG‚Äôs Waterfront Bar & Grill is the most beautiful spot for a seaside wedding in Hollywood, Florida. This restaurant features an incredible menu, which can be specialized to fit your desires and needs for your reception or rehearsal dinner. Aside from the delicious food, GG‚Äôs has a beautiful banquet facility featuring views of the water and extensive seating for you and your family and friends. Pleasant earth-tone wall colors provide an understated elegance and modern linen and brushed chandeliers impart a soft glow. Water-themed pictures of beaches, rivers and coastal waters set in brushed metal and ebony frames add a sophisticated note to the d√©cor while antique copper heat lamps that arc over the kitchen provide a rich tone to the colorful activity below. Their new patio waterfront lounge, perfect for your cocktail hour, is a great place where your guests can enjoy sipping cocktails at the bar or at lounge tables and couches as stylish yachts glide by.Their experienced banquet team will listen and help you plan an event that will fulfill all of your wildest dreams, and impress your guests at the same time. READ MORE Additional details Service Options Venue notes There is no rental fee for the reception but there is a food and beverage minimum applied to all events. The venue allows 4 hours of event time excluding set up and clean up time. Amenities and Restrictions Amenities - Dance floor - Tables and chairs provided - Linens, silverware, glassware provided - Outdoor lighting - Venue set up and clean up - Votive candles - Day-of coordinator - Full kitchen facilities - Valet/shuttle service provided Restrictions - All food and beverage handled by venue - Food & beverage minimum - Venue must approve all decorations - No rice, birdseed, confetti, etc. - Catering provided by venue - Amplified music OK indoors and outdoors - Smoking outside only - Alcohol must be provided by venue - Music must end by 11:00PM Amenities - Dance floor - Tables and chairs provided - Linens, silverware, glassware provided - Outdoor lighting - Venue set up and clean up - Votive candles - Day-of coordinator - Full kitchen facilities - Valet/shuttle service provided Restrictions - All food and beverage handled by venue - Food & beverage minimum - Venue must approve all decorations - No rice, birdseed, confetti, etc. - Catering provided by venue - Amplified music OK indoors and outdoors - Smoking outside only - Alcohol must be provided by venue - Music must end by 11:00PM Links GG's Waterfront 954-929-4237 CALL VENUE FAVORITE Venue Highlights Indoor and outdoor spaces Rentals included Valet parking STARTING AT $2,608 FOR 50 GUESTS Price this venue to get your customized estimate, no strings attached PRICE THIS VENUE Interested in this venue? Don't miss out! Message this venue now to check their availability and receive more information. No commitment required. GG's Waterfront Bar & Grill | Hollywood Venue | PartySlate Skip to content Venues Planners Vendors Ideas Venues Planners Vendors Ideas GG's Waterfront Bar & Grill Find Venues / Florida / Hollywood / GG's Waterfront Bar & Grill Unclaimed GG's Waterfront Bar & Grill 606 N Ocean Dr, Hollywood, FL 33019, USA Max Seated 100 Max Standing 80 Request info Favorite Owner hasn't claimed this business If you own this business, claim your profile to update information, add photos, and more. Claim Profile Overview Gallery 0 About GG's Waterfront Bar & Grill Hollywood's finest waterfront restaurant and lounge! Join them for lunch, dinner and happy hours daily!

Our Events Director can be reached at 954.929.4237 if you have any questions or concerns about your event.

GG's Waterfront can accommodate parties and gatherings for groups ranging from 20 to 450 people or more.
Our knowledgeable banquet staff will take the time to understand your needs and assist you in planning an event that will leave a lasting impression on your guests!

We have a private dining room available. Meeting rooms are available. Parties on the docks. Lounge parties and club nights are two of the most popular types of entertainment.
Sales meetings are held. Banquets. Weddings. Bar and Bat Mitzvahs are Jewish religious ceremonies. Anniversaries. Special Occasions. WIFI is provided for free. Please contact us for a no-obligation proposal!

In addition to our private banquet facilities, we offer a classic wine cellar dining room that can accommodate up to 14 guests at a single large table in the wine cellar setting.

In 2010, veteran restaurateurs Dan and Lise-Anne Serafini, who had previously opened the popular "East Side Marios" in Aventura and the popular "Big Tomato Grill" in Pembroke Pines, set out to create a one-of-a-kind fine dining establishment that people would enjoy and share with family and friends. After discovering the opportunity to purchase Giorgio's Grill, which was formerly known as Joe Sonken's Gold Coast Restaurant, they transformed it into GG's Waterfront Bar and Grill. Since 1985, they have been devoted to the creation of exceptional food and dining experiences, which has been the driving force behind the development of this chef-centric, high-energy concept. Customers and restaurant critics have praised the couple's complete renovation of the interior and exterior of the building, as well as the addition of a new prep kitchen and a menu featuring locally sourced ingredients. The Serafinis strive to provide a warm and welcoming environment as well as exceptional customer service that makes each and every guest feel special.

As a result, GG's has emerged as a must-visit destination for tourists and locals alike, and has established itself as a standout restaurant that has raised the bar in the South Florida dining scene. Event Spaces 1 100 max seated ‚Ä¢ 80 max standing 4 Example Event Space 100 Seated 100 Standing Restaurant Pricing Packages GG's Waterfront Bar & Grill hasn't listed their pricing yet. Connect with them directly to get a customized pricing proposal for your event. Who We Are | Waterfront Toronto Skip to main content Search Close Search Contact us Document library Events News Search About Us Who We Are History & Heritage Accountability Accountability Officer Corporate Reporting Government Partners Capital Peer Review Panel Closed Meeting Investigations Award Winning Work Our Purpose Public Voice Design Excellence Design Review Panel Public Art Accessible Public Spaces Inclusive Growth Innovation & Climate Leadership Environmental Management Green & Resilient Communities Climate Leadership Jobs & Innovation Our projects Scope & Scale Central Waterfront East Bayfront Port Lands West Don Lands Wider Waterfront Opportunities Join Our Team Procurement Current Opportunities Awarded Contracts Conflict of Interest Vendors of Record Pre-Qualified Vendors Employment Initiative Philanthropy main About Us Overview Who We Are History & Heritage Accountability Overview Accountability Officer Corporate Reporting Government Partners Capital Peer Review Panel Closed Meeting Investigations Award Winning Work Our Purpose Overview Public Voice Design Excellence Overview Design Review Panel Public Art Accessible Public Spaces Inclusive Growth Innovation & Climate Leadership Overview Environmental Management Green & Resilient Communities Climate Leadership Jobs & Innovation Our projects Overview Scope & Scale Overview Central Waterfront East Bayfront Port Lands West Don Lands Wider Waterfront Opportunities Overview Join Our Team Procurement Overview Current Opportunities Awarded Contracts Conflict of Interest Vendors of Record Pre-Qualified Vendors Employment Initiative Philanthropy main Contact us Document library Events News Search Home About Us Who We Are Who We Are We draw on the best available expertise to help meet our ambitious city-building goals. Our work is shaped by staff teams, board members, governments, expert advisory panels, Indigenous partners, and partner agencies who share our dedication to ensuring that Toronto‚Äôs waterfront reach its full potential. Planning, design and construction is also done in collaboration with the public. Members of the waterfront community have worked closely with our staff teams over 20-plus years. People from all over the Greater Toronto Area has been engaged in our efforts to create a downtown waterfront for everyone. Learn more about public consultation for waterfront projects . Who's Advising Us? Waterfront Toronto‚Äôs Board of Directors includes leaders from a range of sectors and industries ‚Äî from real estate, finance and business to, not-for-profits culture and the public sector. In addition to our government-appointed Board of Directors, Waterfront Toronto is accountable to the governments of Canada, Ontario and Toronto. Advisory panels provide expertise to help shape our projects and to raise the bar on accessibility, design and green building. These include the city‚Äôs first Design Review Panel , formed in 2005 to promote design excellence. We have a memorandum of understanding (MOU) in cooperation and partnership with the Mississaugas of the Credit First Nation¬†(MCFN) with respect to the revitalization of the Toronto waterfront. The MOU sets objectives, including recognizing and respecting MCFN‚Äôs rights, seeking economic opportunities for MCFN, and partnering to ensure that waterfront revitalization reflects and celebrates the Indigenous history and culture. Image Image Image Working On The Waterfront We have a responsibility to create a workplace where employees feel they belong and to ensure that diverse voices and identities are represented in the waterfront revitalization process. We are building a team that reflects the diversity of the public we serve. In 2020, all our staff, Design Review Panel members and Board of Directors undertook Indigenous Cultural Safety Training. In 2021, we offered training on systemic racism and unconscious bias in recruitment, retention, and performance management. This is just a start and there is much more to do to be true allies to the communities that we serve. Our Senior Management Team provides strategic direction to the corporation and works together to bring our vision to life. The team also provides advice and recommendations to our Board of Directors. Appointed by all three levels of government, Waterfront Toronto‚Äôs Board of Directors includes leaders from a range of sectors and industries ‚Äî from real estate, finance and business to culture and the public sector. They are engaged in Waterfront Toronto‚Äôs work and committed to ensuring that we fulfill our mandate and purpose. Our Board of Directors is composed of 13 members, including a Chair. Each of the three levels of government (federal, provincial, municipal) appoints four directors; the Board Chair is jointly appointed by all three levels. The Waterfront Design Review Panel is an independent advisory body comprised of some of Canada‚Äôs most accomplished city-building professionals. ¬†The Panel strives to add value to every project by providing expert advice that is professional, fair, and constructive. Its role is to promote design excellence, improve environmental performance, and ensure a cohesive approach to waterfront revitalization. Reach out to us, and let‚Äôs start the conversation. CONTACT INFO Get In Touch Talk to us: 01384 473 000‚Äã Email: Info@emmieragroup.com Office Address Unit 8, Waterfront Business Park, Brierley Hill
West Midlands
DY5 1LX WRITE TO US Leave Us A Message Name Email Service/Product Interest Select Service or Product Furniture Repair Property Repair Emmiera Insurance Solutions Commercial Repair Message Send Just some of the brands we work with FAQ Frequently Asked Questions If you have a query you can contact one of our team, or have a look at the frequently asked questions below. How can I reschedule my appointment? Reach out to our dedicated booking team at 01384 473000, and they‚Äôll assist you in cancelling and rescheduling your appointment as per your convenience. Will I receive a reminder for my scheduled appointment? Absolutely. Once your appointment is set, we‚Äôll send you an email confirmation. Additionally, you‚Äôll receive email and text reminders a day prior, along with regular updates on the day of your appointment. What's the preferred method to get in touch with Emmiera Group? You can always ring us at 01384 473000. Alternatively, just complete our contact form and our proactive team will reach out to you promptly. How soon can I expect a technician visit after making a request? We strive to serve our customers promptly. Typically, we aim to visit within 5 working days from the time your request is registered in our system. What kind of damage repairs can be conducted within my home? The vast majority of our repair services are designed to be executed within your home for your convenience. For more complex repairs, we might need to transport the furniture to our workshop, but we always ensure you‚Äôre informed in advance. How much time does a typical repair process consume? Will I be without my furniture for long? The duration depends on the nature of the repair. While some can be resolved within half an hour, others might take longer. However, most repairs are conducted right at your home, ensuring minimal disruption. Only in instances of significant damage might we need to transport your furniture to our workshop for comprehensive care. Is sofa reupholstery a service you offer? Yes, indeed. We provide a vast selection of fabric and leather options for your sofa or chair reupholstery. If you have a specific material in mind, we‚Äôre more than happy to accommodate. Can I provide my own choice of fabric or leather for the upholstery? Certainly! If you‚Äôve selected a particular fabric or leather, feel free to supply it, and we‚Äôll ensure it‚Äôs used to craft your desired piece. My pet has caused some damage to my furniture. Can you help? Absolutely. Pets can be a little mischievous at times. Whether it‚Äôs upholstery or wooden furniture, our team is equipped to rectify pet-induced damages, restoring your piece‚Äôs original charm. Is it possible to restore my old furniture to its original state? Absolutely. No matter the furniture type, our expert technicians can repair it, restoring its original beauty. If you‚Äôre looking for a style shift, we‚Äôve got that covered too with our diverse range of fabrics and leathers. The Emmiera Group is an independently owned company which provides a dynamic, on site repair service for leather, soft furnishings, beds and cabinets with a Passion for Perfection Guaranteed!
